title: How to Make a Wiki with Google

steps.title: Ensure you have a Google account.
steps.content: Ensure you have a Google account. If you don't have one, you can easily make one by going to https://www.google.com/

steps.title: Create a Google Site next.
steps.content: Create a Google Site next. To make one, go to https://sites.google.com/ . Then click on Create to design your own site. Start making pages for where the wikis will be.

steps.title: Start a Google Doc.
steps.content: Start a Google Doc. To do that, go to https://drive.google.com/ . Then, click on Create and then document.

steps.title: Share the document.
steps.content: Share the document. Once the document is created, Click on where it says "Share" in the top right corner. Name it and click "Next."

steps.title: Change the visibility setting.
steps.content: Change the visibility setting. Currently it will say "Private Only" the people listed below can access. Click where it says "Change", then change the visibility option to "Public on the Web". Now it should say at the bottom "Can view." Change that to "Can edit" and click save.

steps.title: Go to File and then go to "Publish to the Web."
steps.content: Go to File and then go to "Publish to the Web." Then click on "Start Publishing." Now it should say "Document link" and have a URL. Copy the URL.

steps.title: Go back to your Google site.
steps.content: Go back to your Google site. Go to the page you want the wiki to be on. Go into edit mode and click on Insert and then More Gadgets. Click on the gadget that says "Include gadget(iframe)." Paste the URL you copied before into where it says "URL to content." Uncheck where it says "Display Title on Gadget." Then click OK.

steps.title: Type in somewhere on the page "Edit this wiki".
steps.content: Type in somewhere on the page "Edit this wiki". Do not use quotation marks. Highlight the word and click on the chain icon on the top bar.

steps.title: Go to your Google Doc and copy the URL.
steps.content: Go to your Google Doc and copy the URL. Then go back to the Google Site and click on where it says "Web Address." Paste the URL where it says "Link to this URL." Check "open this link in new window" and click OK. If you go to Save, your wiki should be finished. People can now edit it and view it.
